text: Charlot Salwai Tabimasmas (born 24 April 1963)"Hon. Charlot Salwai" , Vanuatu Parliament, 20 January 2015 is a Vanuatuan politician. He has been the Prime Minister of Vanuatu since 2023, having been prime minister before from 2016 to 2020. He is the leader of the Reunification of Movements for Change (RMC). ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Current national leaders Category:Prime ministers of Vanuatu
title: Charlot Salwai
